steps.name: the user is logged in with email "client@crassula.io" and password "Qwerty123"
the user navigates to the currency exchange page
the user selects "USD" as the source currency
the user selects "EUR" as the target currency
the transaction details should be displayed
the dashboard should reflect the updated balance

name: Currency Exchange Functionality
description: Different scenarios for currency exchange features.
